resources.string: Ooooops! Kanbanery crashed, but don\'t worry - let\'s send a crash report and have this bug fixed in no time!
Unexpected error, please send a report...
Kanbanery for Android has crashed, sorry!
Please click here to help fix the issue.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click \'OK\'. Thanks :-)
If you can describe what you were doing when the app failed, please do, it\'ll help us a lot:
